import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBars, faUser, faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Link,useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; function NavBar({ toggleSidebar }) { const location = useLocation(); const isLoginPage = location.pathname === '/login'; // Check if it's the login page if (isLoginPage) { return null; // Don't render the NavBar on the login page } return (
